Portal is a unique idea for a puzzle game where the player has to shoot portals in walls that lets you move between the two portals 

and the use of momentum and other mechanics makesthe game one of the best puzzle games in ages

however this game doesnt have much of a story until you reach the end of chapter 19 where personally the game flips upside down and changes from the very quiet test chamber into something...... more....... intense

overall its a very nice game that i recommend buying especially with its cheap price

oh and storywise you may want to complete this game and move on to portal 2 since thats where the story is rich but portal as a prequel is a fantastic build-up towards portal 2

Игра великолепна, но есть один минус - озвучка. Дело в том что русская озвучка имеет неприятную особенность - она обрывается периодически на полу-слове и реплика проглатывается. Дело в том что эта проблема очень распространённая, но valve не считают что это проблема. Хотя из-за этого весь процесс "погружения" в игру теряется, это как заноза, вроде мелочь, а свербит мозг очень сильно.
Why are the Portals in the Screenshots Different Than the Portals in the game? Besides that The Game is Pretty Good for 2007, Game is Kinda Short though.

Пожалуй, одна из наилучших головоломок, из когда-либо виданных мной.

Первый Portal в первую очередь это достаточно аутентичный вырезок из газеты, которую все читают, но никто не замечает определенный фрагмент между строк (а сие есть наша игра). Игра больше выглядит сырой, чем она на самом деле, потому что мы привыкли называть сырыми Beta-версии продуктов, а Portal малость самую отшлифована от Beta-набросков. Если вы присмотритесь к детищам Valve в момент развития плода, вы обнаружите: все они толком мрачные, с вкраплениями крипоты, что ли. Вальвовская игра в порталы сохранила ту жесткую интригу, местами пугающее окружение и легкий привкус неизданного когда-либо. Я старался максимально донести, какую ценность представляет Portal в библиотеке разработчика и в коллекции любого уважающего себя нёрда, но я почти уверен, что мой язык не понятен и, коль так, вам остается только прочувствовать это на себе. Переигрывая Portal вновь, мне видится все тот же "сырой" некий кусок, но мои куриные мозги на сей раз приводят к тому, что данная игра и должна такой быть. Будь она не сырой, она была бы не такой самобытной, что сказалось бы на восприятии минимум.

А еще тут оперная певица в конце поет НЕоперу. Это лютый win.

[spoiler]Знаю, мало похоже на обзор, но обозревая Portal чувствуешь себя глупым, дескать, что, правда?[/spoiler]

I beated this within 3 hours after playing Portal 2 which took me 20 hours (not counting the hours spent on workshop maps).

Portal wasn't one of those long drawn out games. It had a very well thought out story that has been compacted into 4 hours. You are in this Lab that is run by a robot named Gladous. Gladous runs tests on you throughout the game. The robot has a thirst to run tests on your for a very long time. So, you try to escape using your portal gun, allowing you to go any where you want by placing two portals down. Just when you've almost escaped, an explosion knocks you unconscience. That is where the story ends for now. I rate this 7.8/10.

Portal is a fun relaxing and short game it is worth giving a try at steam sales as it is extremely short and not worth full price at all.
If you do buy the game make sure you go to the community mods and download some extra levels as they will increase the fun in the game. The mechanics of the game are really fun and the puzzles are really creative. I suggest you buy this game.

Although Portal is a shorter game I believe that it is worth it. Very enjoyable game that has a incredible story line and is like a giant 3D puzzle. It enforces you to think outside the cube(box). I recommend this to all that love a good story.

Отличная головоломка с внешностью шутера, благодаря виду от первого лица и знакомым предметам из Half-Life. Тем не менее не стоит обманываться внешним видом Portal - это именно головоломка, где 90% времени занимает поиск решения, а 10% - проходит в тренировке мелкой моторики. Сюжет не блещет особыми изысками и тем не менее он интересен в своей простоте и заставляет с интересом проходить комнату за комнатой в ожидании ответа на вопрос: что же скрывается за стенами этой лаборатории. Поддерживают интригу и неожиданная демонстрация потайных комнат и коридоров, скрывающихся за внешними блестящими декорациями, которые ты изучаешь в надежде получить ответы на все вопросы и найти выход.
Great story, fun puzzle solving and interaction between A.I and player make it one of the best games I've eveer played. Definitely would recommend.

[h1]RESUMO[/h1]
Definitivamente um dos clássicos intemporais do gaming e uma experiência que irá mudar a maneira como os jogadores pensam e resolvem problemas. Altamente recomendado.

[table]
[tr]
	[th]GRÁFICOS / ESTÉTICA[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Este jogo é suportado pela Source Engine, uma das mais populares bases de criação de videojogos, sobre a qual assentam títulos como Half Life, Counter Strike, DOTA 2 (que recentemente foi transferido para o seu sucessor, Source 2), que revolucionaram o mundo do gaming. Esta engine caracteriza-se por adequar-se a todas as qualidades de hardware, o que significa que tanto utilizadores de computadores mais limitados como de máquinas poderosas conseguem desfrutar das experiências criadas com a mesma.

Isto não quer dizer que os visuais sejam de má qualidade, muito pelo contrário. Para um jogo com 9 anos (tendo sido lançado em 2007), ainda é agradável visualmente.[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

[table]
[tr]
	[th]GAMEPLAY[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]O jogo centra-se à volta da resolução de problemas com o uso de portais. Isto obriga o jogador a aprender uma nova e impressionante maneira de pensar (a famosa expressão "think with portals"). Ensinar isto aos jogadores é o que o Portal faz magnificamente; o jogo é uma demonstração do mais elevado nível de design de tutoriais.

Os puzzles são desafiantes, mas são ensinados ao jogador os conhecimentos necessários para os resolver e o jogo requer mais reflexão e exercício do cérebro que a maioria.

Quanto à duração, o jogo é bastante curto, tendo-me levado cerca de 4 horas para completar, mas divertido o suficiente para jogar mais algumas vezes. Existem tambem mapas de bónus mais desafiantes. Parece claro que este primeiro jogo foi uma experiência com o conceito dos portais, que a Valve depois desenvolveu para originar uma experiência mais longa no Portal 2.[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

[table]
[tr]
	[th]HISTÓRIA / NARRATIVA[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]O Portal não é um jogo focado na narrativa mas o que faz nesse aspeto, fá-lo bem.[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

[table]
[tr]
	[th]OUTROS ASPETOS[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Uma outra característica interessante são os comentários dos desenvolvedores, que explicam como vários elementos do jogo foram criados. Além disso, o jogo apresenta compatibilidade com o Source SDK, o que permite a criação de níveis pelos jogadores.[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

[h1]NOTA FINAL: 9/10[/h1]

PORTAL เป็นเกมที่สนุกมากครับ เป็นเกมแก้ปริศนาอีก น่าสนใจมากครับ มีเนื้อเรื่องที่เข้มข้นมาก (แต่อยากรู้ว่า Cake ที่ GLaDOS บอกอยู่ไหน)
ให้คะแนน 10/10 ครับ

Un juego excelete. Lo único que resta son sus pocas horas de juego, pero eso no quita nada comparado con la excelencia del juego. Un personaje jugable muy misterioso, de la cual, la única certeza que tenemos es su imagen cuando nos miramos al espejo, ya que nunca habla, y la historia no permite saber mucho de ella. Un antagonista excelente con el cual se puede encariñarse rápidamente. Los puzles son muy buenos, nunca se te van las ganas de rejugarlo, e intentar sacar el menor tiempo posible. Tanto este juego como el 2do de la saga son excelentes. Muy recomendable 10/10 (Y no le pongo 11/10 solo por sus horas jugables).

本来只是尝试性的玩一会的打算，结果没想到一口气玩到了通关，可能是游戏的设定规则实在是新颖和有趣，完全停不下来啊；虽然中间也有一些地方卡了很久，但冷静下来思考规划后就又会出现新的体会，很多地方都需要用到连续惯性来突破看似难以逾越的障碍。另外我想说的是，虽然主角我平时看不见，但当两个传送门叠加时就会很清楚的看到主角的样子，几次吓得掉了下去，这是啥，怎么可以这么清奇，完全颠覆了我的想象啊喂。咳咳，不过话说回来，这依然是一款十分赞的游戏，设计者为了难倒我们花尽心思，非常值得一试。还有，结局的程序猿之歌听了内牛马面，玩家经历无数艰难困苦最后胜利能听到这样的歌，发糖发糖。
Я бы долго не задерживался..

I finished Portal for the second time afer a few years and it's as good as I remembered it to be. It's not as much a game as an experience, polished and sublime, one that makes you feel like you're inside that world. A bit outdated but very climatic visuals, perfect audio (voices), this game has a great overall feel, no wonder it has so many positive reviews. A warning though - if someone suffers from claustrophobia or nauseates easily, and experiences these problems even in games, they can find some parts of Portal unpleasant.

Every man woman and child on the face of the planet should play this game.  Unless you cheat and use YouTube to solve the puzzels, you will literally be able to feel new connections forming between the synapsis in your brain as you think about it in the middle of the night.

(For those who don't know, in 2010 this game was REQUIRED MATERIAL for undergraduate students seeking any degree at Wabash College, alongside other classic material such as The Epic of Gilgamesh, Hamlet, and Aristotle.)

Don't forget to play the sequel once you finish this.  It's not quite as life-altering, but it does have better graphics, and expands on everything here.

This game is great. It's not as good as the second one, and it's kind of short, but it is really good. If you're a fan of Half-Life, you should definitely try this out. The graphics are a bit dated, but not bad. Gameplay is good, the puzzles really make you think. And after you beat the campaign, there are challenge maps you can play.

I think that this is one of the best video games of all time. The standard level design is extremely good. The game mechanic (using the portal gun) is completely original. GLaDOS, the NPC that "helps" you throughout the game is extremely funny and superbly voice acted. Lastly, the game ending is perfect. I challenge you not to sing the closing credits song "Still Alive" for days or weeks after finishing the game. I love this game and GLaDOS so very, very much!

[h1]This was a triumph...[/h1]
This game is utterly and totally great. While it released quietly in 2007, I am hard-pressed to think of a game that deserves tons of attention as this one should. A brilliant puzzle game, with dark humor and challenging ideas. I would definitely recommend this game to people searching for a challenge. The end level is especially difficult [spoiler](GLaDOS begins a neurotoxin countdown as you rush to destroy her with cores)[/spoiler] and the game is a bit short as well, but it is absolutely worth the measly 10 bucks. If you've got some extra Steam credit, this a definite reccomendation.

Everyone knows this game is good.

It can be finished in an afternoon, but if you get it for a good price it'll be one of those games you finish and sit back with a grin on your face. Partly because you feel like you're a puzzle solving bad-ass, and partly because now you understand the cake joke the internet won't stop going on about.

Portal was my first experience with a puzzle game. Initially, I didn’t like it very much. I found it a bit boring and I felt locked up in this environment, unable to explore. Only after my third attempt to get back to the game I realized I was approaching it with the wrong perspective. I changed my attitude and decided to roleplay the character. It became a puzzle, horror, comedy world for me and I love it. The visuals are great for its time, the physics are well implemented and the puzzles were just hard enough to push me to beat them all. It took me less than ten hours to complete the game, but I enjoyed my frustration, discovery and success moments equally. I’m looking forward for the sequel.

I find this game good for speed running. The game is designed to be short. It was to see what people thought of the concept of using portals in a game. If it wasn't for this, Portal 2 wouldn't even exist!

When I first played through the game, I found some of the puzzles quite challenging. But after playing this game over and over again, I now know how to get through each level.

Overall, Portal doesn't have great replay value, but it is great for speedrunning as I said before.
second best game in the world! the first is portl 2 <3
